track.name: Demons
comments: I love this song. I don't hear any Coldplay in this. . .

Don't get too close
It's dark inside
It's where my demons hide

I can't escape this now, if you don't show me how

Chills. Absolute chills.
best song on the album tbqh
I see I'm not the first to hear this and think it was Coldplay....
All because they're writing is similar to each other. Be it Isaac Slade, Ryan Tedder, or Chris Martin. I love all of them.
This song is kinda coldplayish, but I don't think the vocals sounds like  Chris Martin. Anyway, this is a great song.
This.Song.Is.Too.Bloody.SHORT!!!! - and I'm really not getting the Coldplay comparisons with these guys :S. Nothing against Coldplay, but ID kinda wipe the floor with them >.<
